    Example 1: Sparse Correspondence Analysis of the Causes of Death in the US in 2019 example2 example3 example4

    Group sparse Correspondence Analysis

    sparseCA.Rd

    Group sparse Correspondence Analysis

    Usage

    sparseCA(
  DATA,
  components = 0,
  tol = .Machine$double.eps,
  doublecentering = TRUE,
  init = "svd",
  initLeft = NULL,
  initRight = NULL,
  seed = NULL,
  rdsLeft = rep(1, components),
  rdsRight = rep(1, components),
  grpLeft = NULL,
  grpRight = NULL,
  orthogonality = "loadings",
  OrthSpaceLeft = NULL,
  OrthSpaceRight = NULL,
  projPriority = "orth",
  projPriorityLeft = projPriority,
  projPriorityRight = projPriority,
  itermaxALS = 1000,
  itermaxPOCS = 1000,
  epsALS = 1e-10,
  epsPOCS = 1e-10
)

    Arguments

    DATA

    The contingency table for analysis.

    components

    The number of dimensions for the analysis; defaults to 0.

    tol

    Tolerance for the convergence criterion; defaults to .Machine$double.eps.

    doublecentering

    Logical indicating whether double centering should be applied; defaults to TRUE.

    init

    Method for initialization; defaults to "svd".

    initLeft

    Initial values for the left side; defaults to NULL.

    initRight

    Initial values for the right side; defaults to NULL.

    seed

    Seed for random number generation; defaults to NULL.

    rdsLeft

    Radii for the left side; defaults to rep(1, components).

    rdsRight

    Radii for the right side; defaults to rep(1, components).

    grpLeft

    Group assignments for the left side; defaults to NULL.

    grpRight

    Group assignments for the right side; defaults to NULL.

    orthogonality

    Type of orthogonality constraint; defaults to "loadings".

    OrthSpaceLeft

    Orthogonal space for the left side; defaults to NULL.

    OrthSpaceRight

    Orthogonal space for the right side; defaults to NULL.

    projPriority

    Priority of the projection; defaults to "orth".

    projPriorityLeft

    Priority of the left projection; defaults to projPriority.

    projPriorityRight

    Priority of the right projection; defaults to projPriority.

    itermaxALS

    Maximum number of ALS iterations; defaults to 1000.

    itermaxPOCS

    Maximum number of POCS iterations; defaults to 1000.

    epsALS

    Convergence criterion for ALS; defaults to 1e-10.

    epsPOCS

    Convergence criterion for POCS; defaults to 1e-10.

    Value

    Returns an object of class c("sSVD", "sGSVD", "list") containing the results of the group sparse correspondence analysis. This object includes various components produced by the sparse generalized singular value decomposition (sparseGSVD) and the subsequent spafac.out processing. Key components include the singular values, left and right singular vectors, and additional metrics relevant to the analysis. The object also contains X.preproc, the preprocessed data matrix used in the analysis.

    Examples

    
data("example1_sCA") # Load the Cause of Deaths Data
sca.res <- sparseCA(as.matrix(example1_sCA), components = 2L, rdsLeft = c(1.3, 1.3), rdsRight = c(2.3, 2.3))
#> [1] 0.4520297 0.1799586
